summary: TJ Kippen.
title: TJ Kippen.
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2qFTRNa

by Squilkey

When a new kid starts at Jefferson, Cyrus can’t stop thinking about him. He should be someone Cyrus should just ignore, more trouble than he’s worth, but he can’t. He attempts to get closer to him, creating problems in almost every corner of his life.

Words: 1434, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Rating: General Audiences

  • Relationships: Cyrus Goodman/T. J. Kippen

summary: I just posted the first chapter of my long fic! Check it out if you please :) It’s going to be pretty long and I’m gonna try to...
body:
I just posted the first chapter of my long fic! Check it out if you please :) It’s going to be pretty long and I’m gonna try to update regularly between one-shots and drabbles,  I like having something to go back to. 

Summary

When a new kid starts at Jefferson, Cyrus can’t stop thinking about him. He should be someone Cyrus should just ignore, more trouble than he’s worth, but he can’t. He attempts to get closer to him, creating problems in almost every corner of his life.

Title is working… i couldn’t really think of anything else and since the whole thing revolves around out boy, seemed to make sense.

tags: no one prob cares what i think should've happened but you're getting it anyway
needed to put it out there
i know this is pointless but oh well
summary: I’m still hung up on how much I didn’t like the set up in episode 5, so please  humor me with this. It’s a little extra so I’ll...
body:
I’m still hung up on how much I didn’t like the set up in episode 5, so please  humor me with this. It’s a little extra so I’ll put in a ‘keep reading’ at some point.

How it should have gone: The bulk of time should have been spent on the canoeing, make this episode really relationship focused. This was a perfect episode to set up the fall of Wuffy. Give them a brief argument about something, even if it’s simple, like they can’t agree on which way to row the canoe or go deeper and make it about Andi. Since the writers chose to make Wuffy a happy, mostly background couple the reason for their breakup will likely be mainly because Andi is uncomfortable. It’s a good lesson for kids, that friendship is more important than boyfriends/girlfriends but if Wuffy doesn’t have some conflict (other than right before they break up) it puts most of the blame on Andi.

This also would have been a great moment to showcase some platonic Jonah/Cyrus. It was a huge missed opportunity to separate these two from everyone else and only give them a few passing lines about Cyrus losing his paddle. We could’ve gotten a scene where Cyrus, being the low-key nosey/eager to help friend he is, asks Jonah if he likes anyone else now that he and Andi are broken up. We know Andi asked Cyrus about it in the text app so maybe Cyrus seized his chance away from everyone to find out the truth. I don’t think Jonah actually has a crush on anyone else but this would’ve been an opportunity to really mislead the audience. Jonah, looking over towards the other canoes and refusing to answer, asks Cyrus the same question. Cyrus then says “I think–” but before Cyrus can finish his sentence, they realize that while talking, they’ve absentmindedly dropped both their paddles in the water. They then have to figure out how to get back to shore. Just to make it not exactly what Amber and Andi did, Cyrus probably freaks out while Jonah uses his arms to paddle awkwardly to shore. It isn’t much but it would’ve given the casual audience a chance to think wait, does Cyrus like someone?

The B Plot: It makes no sense that Bex would be that against tasting cake. I get that she doesn’t want a big fancy wedding but…it’s cake. It seems like the one wedding thing Bex would want to be involved in. You made one with Andi that time. We know you love cake. We all love cake. Anyway. Instead of after the canoe trip, while all that is happening Bowie, Bex and Celia go cake tasting. Or, even better, Celia tells Bex and Bowie,

“By the way, I made you two a cake tasting appointment…What? I knew you weren’t going to do it yourself. It’s at 2:30 so you guys better get going!”

Give them a montage, similar to Andi and CeCe’s. Cue a few funny lines, feeding cake to each other and a similar shot of them feeling sick after consuming many a cake. They argue over which cake to pick, eventually choosing to do half one flavor and half the other. 

Bex: Can we do that?

Bowie: It’s our wedding, we can do whatever we want. 

Andi comes home from the lake, initially upset,

“I can’t believe you guys went without me.”

“Would you be willing to forgive in exchange for cake?”

“That depends, is it chocolate fudge?”

Bex and Bowie smile, “One of them is.”

Cut the whole Shaun storyline from this episode and pick it back up again in a week or two when Jonah has time to be involved in it. Jonah could become Shaun’s teacher/mentor (or he and Bowie could work together to encourage Shaun to tell his dad he doesn’t want to play guitar).
body_abstract:
I’m still hung up on how much I didn’t like the set up in episode 5, so please  humor me with this. It’s a little extra so I’ll put in a ‘keep reading’ at some point.

How it should have gone: The bulk of time should have been spent on the canoeing, make this episode really relationship focused. This was a perfect episode to set up the fall of Wuffy. Give them a brief argument about something, even if it’s simple, like they can’t agree on which way to row the canoe or go deeper and make it about Andi. Since the writers chose to make Wuffy a happy, mostly background couple the reason for their breakup will likely be mainly because Andi is uncomfortable. It’s a good lesson for kids, that friendship is more important than boyfriends/girlfriends but if Wuffy doesn’t have some conflict (other than right before they break up) it puts most of the blame on Andi.

blog.name: la-mariposa-de-las-estrellas
blog.title: Oof
blog.description: ¡Me llamo Bree, y yo usaré mi blog para mejorar mi español! (es mi segunda idioma, ingles es mi primera) No hablo español perfectamente, perdona mis errores por favor 😅| ¡Yo aprecio correcciones que pueden encontrar para mejorar mi español, quiero saber cuando no digo algo correctamente!

summary: ¡Hola!
title: ¡Hola!
body:
¡Me llamo bree, bienvenidos a mi blog! Yo quiero encontrar más amigos en tumblr, especialmente personas que pueden hablar español porque es mi segunda idioma y quiero practicar con habladores nativos.
¡Si te gusta Andi Mack (me encanta tyrus 😃), Choices: Stories You Play, Shadowhunters, Harry Potter, Yuri!!! On Ice o libros por Rick Riordan, Verónica Roth, y Cassandra Clare por favor seguir a mi cuenta y envíame un mensaje!
Un poco información sobre yo: la música es mi vida y toco el piano, clarinete, ukelele, y más instrumentos (piano es mi favorito), me encanta animales y tengo 6 gatos, y yo vivo en Nueva York en los Estados Unidos. ¡No puedo esperar hasta puedo hablar con ustedes!
(Mi español todavía tiene que mejorar, probablamente voy a tener errores cuando hablo, lo siento 😅)

¡Si te gusta Andi Mack (me encanta tyrus 😃), Choices: Stories You Play, Shadowhunters, Harry Potter, Yuri!!! On Ice o libros por Rick Riordan, Verónica Roth, y Cassandra Clare por favor seguir a mi cuenta y envíame un mensaje!
Un poco información sobre yo: la música es mi vida y toco el piano, clarinete, ukelele, y más instrumentos (piano es mi favorito), me encanta animales y tengo 6 gatos, y yo vivo en Nueva York en los Estados Unidos. ¡No puedo esperar hasta puedo hablar con ustedes!
(Mi español todavía tiene que mejorar, probablamente voy a tener errores cuando hablo, lo siento 😅)

blog.name: tyguygoodman
blog.title: We gather here Togay
blog.description: "Why use a fork when you can just stab your food with a knife?"

summary: Ladies and gents, and lovely people of the Internet.
body:
Ladies and gents, and lovely people of the Internet.

I am here to talk to you about the scarily aggressive shipping war between Jyrus and Tyrus.

Lately on tumblr, Instagram, YouTube, etc. People have off an on been getting attacked for options, contradictions, and so on so forth. And it’s been bothering me a lot lately.

I have a simple lesson that I want to teach you so please, listen up.

You are on the internet, and a lot of you are on tumblr aka the most offended website in the history of the internet, if you want to state an opinion, people are going to disagree, somebody somewhere ALWAYS disagrees.

If you feel offended because someone said you are and idiot for shipping something, let it slide. That person had an opinion they wanted to share but they didn’t want to share it on a kind way so do to take time out of your day to fight them. Do not try to tell the entire internet with twice as much aggression how offended you are.

You should only have a conversation with someone with opposite veiws if you are both willing to have a CIVIL conversation or respectful debate.

This one post could never reach the whole internet, but in this somewhat large community, I know we can all be mature. And if you meet someone that isn’t, forget them. You’re just having your fun. So the people that are attacking others for their opinions are in the wrong, but people that respond to them telling them to stop, need to calm down and think. They aren’t going to listen.

Im not trying to talk to the people that are attacking others for their opinions right now, I’m talking to the people that are responding because I know those kind of people will listen.

Thank you for reading, because I know if we can all follow this, we can fill the community with more support than the hate some people are fueling it with, without even realizing it. and soon all the hate will be lost in the noise of all the support. And double thanks to the people that always ignore the hate.

Sincerily, a person that just wants Cyrus to be happy, and wants the community to be happy too. ☺️

Did she forgot about that or is she saving it for the wedding?

blog.name: theheightofdishonor
blog.title: Height of Dishonor
blog.description: to mistrust his friends

summary: I just watched AM ep 5 and like first of all-I love tyrus but just-that lifted my cold dead jyrus heart back from the dead and...
body:
I just watched AM ep 5 and like first of all-I love tyrus but just-that lifted my cold dead jyrus heart back from the dead and it hurts because I know Cyrus is going to end up with TJ and I love that, I love them but this episode just kind of reminded me why I loved Jyrus so much and ugh. Also, I know it’s supposed to be that Andi’s jealous cuz she like Buffi but the entire episode read in an angsty Bandi way and if I didn’t know for sure that there’s no way in hell we’re getting another lgbt+ story line, I would’ve sworn that it looks like an Amber/Andi/Buffy love triangle. I mean, the Buffi angst was real this episode and I missed Ambi, we haven’t gotten any content of them for a while now. Overall, everything with the younger actors was just gay as fuck. 

Bex doing Bowie’s hair was cute and the Shaun story line, while definitely not worth 2 episodes and not particularly eye-catching was important. I loved the Celia/Andi dynamic in this episode and the entire cake deciding scene. At least Bex and Celia fighting over wedding stuff is consistent and god knows that nothing’s ever consistent in this show. The promo for the next episode left me both excited and dissapointed because on one hand, there’s no love triangle of any sort - or at least none that we see from the promo- but at the same time, i’m starved for Tyrus so…..


(Also shipping in this fandom is so hard because Ambi v Bandi v Wandi v Jandi (surprisingly, they grew on me in ep 4) and Buffy seems to like Walker but Muffy is relationship goals and then the eternal, endless showdown between Tyrus v Jyrus. It’s so hard to choose and i’m just an indecisive disaster bi trying to make it out alive)
